thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Leanna Cusack
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Leanna Cusack

author: Leanna Cusack
title: Leanna Cusack
text: The staff were cheerful and helpful. Went out of their way to look for item for me. They even looked up the website for me for alternatives. The lady even checked other stores for me. Good knowledge of the storehouse website and very reassuring of the process. Everything worked out as she said it would.
